text_block_list.text:
There's a fashion show for the latest race clothes. 
so I decided to go see it with King.
The meeting time was supposed to be at 9 o'clock but―

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Too slow! What time do you think it is!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Don't you know if King says 9 o'clock, it means 8 o'clock!? 
What do you think you're doing making me wait an hour?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Good grief, to think they'd put a first-class 
horse girl like me, at the end of the line.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
As punishment, treat me to some tea on the way back. 
Hmph, be thankful for King's generous treatment!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
It's not unreasonable, it's just how it is! 
Quit fussing and get in line!
While being scorned by King Halo, I got in line…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
If there are this many people, it might be 
hard to see the front stage.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Of course!…Hmm, very well. You don't seem to know the 
details, so the kind hearted King will teach you.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Today only top brands are performing. The best products 
by the best craftsman! Truly a first-class gathering!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
A show where even blinking would be a shame! 
Watch with the intention of burning it into your eyes!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Particularly today's special is

King Halo's eyes sparkled, as 
she happily broke down the show.
And so, we waited another hour-

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
It should be starting soon but, is the front side moving? 
We can't see from here.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
They don't intend to make us wait as long as 
possible to limit the number of people do they…
choice_data_list: Should we just give up and go home for the day?
Do you want to give up for the day and go home?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Of course not! Besides, today's show is-
…Excuse me. are you Miss King Halo?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Y-Yes… that's right. 
Who would you be?

So it was you. I'm affiliated with some of the 
show's organizers, your mother went through a lot 
of effort for the designs in this show-

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ah… so that's what it is.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I heard, the race clothes my mother 
made are going to be shown last as a highlight.

Ah, so you also have an interest. You really are her 
daughter. I heard from your mother that you're making 
great efforts at Tracen Academy as wel-

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Did you really hear that from my mother?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Spare me the flattery. I'm her daughter, I 
at least know what she would and wouldn't do.
I-Is that so… excuse me.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ha, seems they were an acquaintance of mother's.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
My, you look like you want to say something. I dislike 
holding back. If you have something to say, go ahead.
choice_data_list: Was your mom involved in this show?
Was your mom involved in this show?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Yes, that's right. After retiring she became a 
designer for race clothes, and is still working today.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I hate to admit it but she's a first-class. One 
after another, surpassing everyone's expectations 
with a dress from a new perspective.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
All for the sake of the horse girls racing. A design that's 
sophisticated and says not to fear casting anything aside. 
There's something to learn there when aiming to be a first-class.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Not that she ever made any for me though.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Well, it can't be helped. Even if she's talented at designing, 
she's no good at sewing. In fact it's almost clumsy.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
But she hates to bet on things and lose. So I'm 
sure she didn't want to see her daughter make 
a clumsy failure in one of her dresses.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
My birthday was the same. Letting me eat the cake 
she bought till I was satisfied. While secretly 
eating the bad looking cake she failed on.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Stupid, isn't it? 
She should just say she failed without being stubborn.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: No she isn't!

Sorry for the wait, everyone! 
We'll begin guiding you around the venue now!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I was really getting tired of waiting. C'mon, let's get going.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
…I've been waiting. If you don't show me a 
dress that's beautiful, I really won't forgive you.

-The fashion show has concluded for today. 
Everyone, please be careful on your way home.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
That… was… the best! Did you see UMADA's new work? 
The changing skirt was so beautiful!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: But the most pretty one was-

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Nevermind!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hmph! I'll surpass mother's records in no time!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
And then, I'll get a big collection of race clothes! 
Not just one, enough to overflow an entire closet!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: After all, I'm the first-class horse girl King Halo!
choice_data_list: That's right, le'ts do our best together.
That's right, le'ts do our best together.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ohhohoho! 
It seems like you're fired up too, thank you thank you ♪

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Now, let's return to the school. 
We're going to reform tomorrow's training plan!

King Halo's eyes after leaving the fashion show, 
seemed to be filled with new determination.
